messages.content:
The context describes a conversation between Brahaspati and Shiva about an invitation to visit Meluha. Brahaspati, optimistic and trusting, believes in the benefits of Meluha, seeing it as a place of fairness, abundance, and divine order. In contrast, Shiva is skeptical due to his experiences with survival struggles in their homeland and his cautious nature. He doubts that anything too perfect can be genuine and feels that trust should only come after earning it.
